```{r}
EOS_gcmd<-EOS %>% unite ("gcmd_path", c("gcmd_term","gcmd_variable"), sep = " ", remove = FALSE)

Req_slim_gcmd<- Req_slim %>% unite("gcmd_path", c("primary_gcmd_term", "primary_gcmd_variable"), sep = " ", remove = FALSE)

GCMD<- GCMD %>% unite ("gcmd_path", c("NOAA.term", "NOAA.l1_variable"), sep = " ",  remove = FALSE)


GCMD$in_EOR<- GCMD$gcmd_path %in% Req_slim_gcmd$gcmd_path
GCMD$in_EOS<- GCMD$gcmd_path %in% EOS_gcmd$gcmd_path

GCMD %>% filter (in_EOR == FALSE & in_EOS == FALSE) %>% View()
```
